name: Quan Fa Organic Farm
description: Quan Fa Organic Farm has been operating for more than 20 years, from a small organic vegetables retailer to one of the leading distributors in Singapore. Their produces are all sourced from the neighbouring countries of Cameron Highlands (Malaysia) and Thailand. All the produces are organically certified. They use no pesticides or harmful fertilizers and adopted a no plastic bag policy.
